attributes.additional_details: The shops are empty. You cannot buy potatoes, pasta , bread eggs, paracetamol  baby wipes etc. as others buy massive amounts and stock pile just in case of lockdown. We need some controls in place.
attributes.background: To introduce restrictions when shopping food, baby stuff, toilet paper,  hand wash, hand gel and medications in these difficult times. It is not right that you cannot buy a bag of potatoes  or baby wipes when somebody else has bought 10pk during one shopping. We need some controls in place.
